Welcome

I’m a designer from Vancouver, Canada. I currently work at Jostle. Please enjoy a few projects I worked on between 2012 and 2014.

  • Know Ideas

    Book Design, Print Production

    Award winning exploration of the Internet using printed experiments.

  • Map of the Internet

    UI/UX, iOS, Android

    Map of the Internet is a 3D visualization of the internet.

  • Devmonitor.io

    UX/UI, Branding, Front-end

    A web app for ‘devangelists’ to track questions from Stackoverflow.
